sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
[Two notable sermones lately preached at Pauls Crosse Anno 1544] Chedsey, William. Scott, Cuthbert, d. 1565.
[147+] p.
by Johannes Herford, at the costs and charges Robert Toye dwellynge in Paules church yarde, at the sygne of the Bell, Jmprynted at London in Aldersgate strete : Anno dñi 1545.
Title from STC (2nd ed.), imprint from colophon. Second sermon is by Cuthbert Scott--Cf. DNB XVII, 953. Head-piece, tail-piece, initials. Signatures: B-I⁸, K¹⁰. Imperfect: preliminaries lacking. Begins with B₁. Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library.
=======

by Johannes Herford, at the costs and charges Robert Toye dwellynge in Paules church yarde, at the sygne of the Bell, Jmprynted at London in Aldersgate strete : Anno dñi 1545.
Title from STC (2nd ed.), imprint from colophon. Second sermon is by Cuthbert Scott--Cf. DNB XVII, 953. Head-piece, tail-piece, initials. Signatures: B-I⁸, K¹⁰. Imperfect: preliminaries lacking. Begins with B₁. Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library.

the costs
